description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Minneapolis, United States. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Elegant Minneapolis Airport Stay with Restaurant, Games Lounge & Complimentary Airport Shuttle
hotels.description: Experience the heart of the Twin Cities with a stay at the InterContinental Minneapolis - St.Paul Airport, an IHG Hotel. Explore the world-renowned Mall of America, enjoy a performance at the Guthrie Theater and relish in the convenience of direct airport access. At the hotel, savour French-inspired cuisine with a Minnesotan twist at La Voya Brasserie or challenge your travel companions to a game of foosball or pool at Bradstreet Crafthouse, the onsite games lounge.

seo.title: Hoteles en Minneapolis - Estados Unidos Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Minneapolis, United States con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
